summary: PROBLEM W/ WIPER CONTROL ON '98 S-10 W/ 48,000 MILES.  FIRST OBSERVED 6 MONTHS AGO WHEN WINDSHIELD WASHER FLUID WAS NO LONGER PUMPED TO WINDSHIELD.  REPLACED PUMP IN RESEVOIR-- STILL HAD PROBLEM.  ABOUT 1 MONTH AGO, WIPERS BEGAN OPERATING ERRATICALLY-- EITHER RUNNING TOO FAST, NOT AT ALL, OR REFUSING TO SHUT OFF.  SUSPECT THIS MAY BE A CONTROL BOARD ISSUE, BUT CURRENT RECALL ONLY COVERS '97'S AND EARLIER
